dn30:1.6.7: anvabhi → anubhi (cck); annubhi (sya1ed, sya2ed); ānubhi (pts1ed); aṁnubhi (ṭīkā)
dn30:1.12.4: Tena sucaritena saggamagamā → tena so sucaritena saggamagamāsi (sya-all)
dn30:1.15.10: Yaṁ gihissapi → na taṁ gihissapi (sya-all, pts1ed)
dn30:1.18.3: Piyavāditañca samānattatañca → piyavadatañca samānachandatañca (bj, pts1ed); piyavadatañca samānachandañca (sya-all)
dn30:1.19.1: pubbe manussabhūto samāno → samāno bahuno janassa (bj, pts1ed)
dn30:1.30.12: Pasayha sahidha sattaratanaṁ → pasayha sa hi ca sattaratanaṁ (bj); pasayha abhivasana-varataraṁ (pts1ed)
dn30:1.33.5: Samaṅgikatvā → samaggi katvā ca (sya-all); samaggiṁ katvā (pts1ed)
dn30:2.3.6: Mahiñca pana ṭhito → sa hi ca pana ṭhito (bj, pts1ed); samā ca panaṭṭhito (sya-all)
dn30:2.6.9: Atthassa middhī ca → idaṁ samiddhañca (bj, mr); addhaṁ samiddhañca (sya-all)
dn30:2.10.2: na ca visāci → na ca visācitaṁ (bj, pts1ed); na ca visāvi (sya-all)
dn30:2.27.2: samphappalāpaṁ na muddhataṁ → na samphappalāpaṁ na vuccaddhatanti (sya-all); samphappalāpaṁ na abuddhatanti (mr)
dn30:2.31.13: Samamapi sucisusukkaṁ → suci ca suvisuddhasusukkaṁ. (sya-all); suvisuddhaṁ suvisukkaṁ. (pts1ed)
dn30:2.31.25: Imamapi ca paramapi ca → paraṁpi paramaṁpi ca (sya-all); imampi ca parampi ca (pts1ed)
